More likely it's solar powered and can recharge mid-battle.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Quick point that must be referenced ... I never saw Coming of the 
> Fuzors, but I do know that Dinobot's only ranged weapons have been 
> energy-based, regardless of which version of Dinobot it is.  And as 
> anyone who knows anything about science can tell you, energy 
weapons 
> don't have "ammo" per se and thuswise don't need reloading.  If 
it's 
> not a built-in device, it may require a fresh power pack once in a 
> while.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> situation...
